creator: Evrac Studio
descriptionHtml:
★ Mini Monster Rumble ★
Mini Monster Rumble is a Tug Of War like Strategy game where you send Monsters to do Auto Battle in a cute 3D fantasy RPG world.

Mini Monster Rumble gameplay is as simple as Tap on buttons and let them battle on their own,
but there’s so many Strategy to consider:
- Elemental weakness : Use Monster with water element to beat Fire for example
- Balancing Team : Which Monsters to bring into battle, and if they have Synergy with each other
- Equipping Items : Consider to improve their weak points, or boost their strong points
- Organize Resource : Coins are limited. Upgrade Castle first or put it into other things

Features
✦ Super Simple Battle System : Just tap on the Monster you want to fight for you!
✦ Super Depth Synergy Strategy : Monsters have Elements that will be stronger against weaker Element. And some Monsters are weak on its own, but do Awesome fight when paired with others
✦ Super Simple Levelling System : Clear stages to get Exp and Coins to level up the monsters. And at certain Levels, they can Evolve to bigger one. BUT bigger doesn’t mean better though. Because size doesn’t matter!
✦ Lots of Fun : Recruit dozens of Monsters, Evolve, get stronger and defeat your enemies!
✦ Totally Offline : Play it anywhere and anytime

****************************
Before you start playing, please read the "Terms of Use" carefully.
By downloading and playing “Mini Monster Rumble“, you agree to these Terms.

Terms of Use
https://evrac.com/minimonster/termscondition.html

Privacy Policy
https://evrac.com/privacy_policy.html
descriptionShort: Command your Mini Monsters and defeat your enemies

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added Items (starts to drop at stage 2)
- Limit battle camera drag
- Added Cloud Save
- Lower API requirement
- Added 120-240 Star Rewards

- “First Time Quest” rewards can be collected after 8 hours
- Monsters can Equip Items starting at level 3

- Added 2 Monsters at Shop

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added our Discord channel link in Option
Join us at
https://discord.gg/QUtSrWhAvG

- Silent Forest 1 - 9 now had a Dragon Boss ^^
- Fixed Weekend Gift cannot be claimed

title: Mini Monster Rumble

creator: Evrac Studio
descriptionHtml:
★ Mini Monster Rumble is an Offline Tug of War Strategy games where you send Monsters to do Auto Battle ★

The gameplay is as simple as Tap on buttons and let them battle on their own,
but there are so many Strategy to consider:
- Elemental weakness : Use Dragon Monster with Fire Element to beat Nature for example
- Balancing Team : Which Monster to bring into battle, and if they have Synergy with each other
- Evolve : Get stronger by Evolving your monsters to next Level
- Equip Items : Consider to improve their weak points, or boost their strong points
- Organize Resource : Coins are limited. Upgrade your Kingdom or put it into other things

Features
✦ Super Simple Battle System : Just tap on the Monster you want to fight for you!
✦ Super Depth Synergy Strategy : Monsters have Elements that will be stronger against weaker Element. And some Monsters are weak on its own, but do Awesome fight when paired with others
✦ Super Simple Levelling System : Clear stages to get Exp and Coins to level up the monsters. And at certain Levels, your Dragon can Evolve to a bigger one. BUT bigger doesn’t mean better though. Because size doesn’t matter!
✦ Lots of Fun : Recruit dozens of Monsters, Evolve, get stronger and defeat your enemies!
✦ Totally Offline : Play it anywhere and anytime
✦ Awesome 3D Graphics : Well it’s just Awesome!
descriptionShort: Defend your Kingdom and Battle your Mini Monster in a cute 3D Fantasy RPG world

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added Library at 20 Star Reward
- You can see data of ALL monsters that you have and that you’ve encountered in battle
- Added Treant Boss in Silent Forest 5 - 40
- Added Stag beetle Boss in Underground Mine 4 - 30

title: Mini Monster Rumble Battle

creator: Evrac Studio
descriptionHtml:
★ Mini Monster Rumble is a Single Player Offline Tug of War Strategy games where you send Monsters to do Auto Battle ★

Features
✦ Super Simple Battle System : Just Tap on the Monster you want to fight!
✦ Super Depth Synergy Strategy : Some Monsters are weak on its own, but have an Awesome Synergy and have High Legends power when paired with others
✦ Super Simple Levelling System : Clear stages to get Experiences and Coins to level up your monsters. And at certain Levels, your Dragon can Neo Evolve to a bigger one
✦ Lots of Fun : Recruit dozens of Monsters and Dragons, Evolve, get stronger and strike your enemies!
✦ Totally Offline and Free : Digital Download for Free and Play it anywhere anytime on your Mobile devices. Or connect to Net to submit Leaderboard & Achievement
✦ Awesome 3D Graphics : Well it’s just Awesome and addicting!

The gameplay is as simple as Tap on buttons and let the Monsters battle on their own,
But don’t just Rush in, there are so many Strategy to think out of the Box:
- Elements Ability : Use Dragon with Fire Element to beat Nature based Monster
- Balancing Team : Build your Team to Fight, see if they have Synergy with each other
- Equip Items : Consider to improve their weak points, or boost their High strong points by Equipping Epic Items
- Evolve : Get stronger by Evolving your monsters to next Level
- Organize Resource : Coin are limited. Upgrade Castle, improve your Squad or hire a Master to manage your Coin

So, what are you waiting for?
Recruit your Heroes and Monsters, Start an Epic Adventure, Rush into War and become part of the Legends!

Join our Discord Gang Channel and Unite with us
https://discord.gg/QUtSrWhAvG
descriptionShort: Defend your Kingdom and Battle your Mini Monster in a cute 3D Fantasy RPG world

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added Daily Quest which Available after clearing 6 stages
- You can store up to 6 quest at a time
- Daily Quest reset every 8 hours
- After clearing Daily Quests, you will get Weekly Chest Points to collect chest. This point reset every Monday
- Slightly Reduce difficulty of Stage 40 Boss

- Balancing Team : Build your Team to Fight, see if they have Synergy with each other
- Equip Items : Consider to improve their weak points, or boost their High strong points by Equipping Epic Items
- Evolve : Get stronger by Evolving your monsters to next Level
- Organize Resource : Coin are limited. Upgrade Castle, improve your Squad or hire a Master to manage your Coin

So, what are you waiting for?
Recruit your Heroes and Monsters, Start an Epic Adventure, Rush into War and become part of the Legends!

Join our Discord Gang Channel and Unite with us
https://discord.gg/QUtSrWhAvG
descriptionShort: Defend your Kingdom and Battle your Mini Monster in a cute 3D Fantasy RPG world

title: Mini Monster Rumble Strategy

creator: Evrac Studio
descriptionHtml:
★ Mini Monster Rumble is a Single Player Offline Tug of War Strategy games where you send Monsters to do Auto Battle ★

Features
✦ Super Simple Battle System : Just Tap on the Monster you want to fight!
✦ Super Depth Synergy Strategy : Some Monsters are weak on its own, but have an Awesome Synergy and have High Legends power when paired with others
✦ Super Simple Levelling System : Clear stages to get Experiences and Coins to level up your monsters. And at certain Levels, your Dragon can Neo Evolve to a bigger one
✦ Lots of Fun : Recruit dozens of Monsters and Dragons, Evolve, get stronger and strike your enemies!
✦ Totally Offline and Free : Digital Download for Free and Play it anywhere anytime on your Mobile devices. Or connect to Net to submit Leaderboard & Achievement
✦ Awesome 3D Graphics : Well it’s just Awesome and addicting!

The gameplay is as simple as Tap on buttons and let the Monsters battle on their own,
But don’t just Rush in, there are so many Strategy to think out of the Box:
- Elements Ability : Use Dragon with Fire Element to beat Nature based Monster
- Balancing Team : Build your Team to Fight, see if they have Synergy with each other
- Equip Items : Consider to improve their weak points, or boost their High strong points by Equipping Epic Items
- Evolve : Get stronger by Evolving your monsters to next Level
- Organize Resource : Coin are limited. Upgrade Castle, improve your Squad or hire a Master to manage your Coin

So, what are you waiting for?
Recruit your Heroes and Monsters, Start an Epic Adventure, Rush into War and become part of the Legends!
